caption: In a room, two women were having a meal. One of them was slightly older, and the other appeared to be a young girl dressed in green clothing. They were engaged in conversation and seemed to be in cheerful spirits. Just then, the young girl entered the room, and her female servant approached her, saying something to her. The young girl appeared quite surprised.On a balcony, two men were conversing. They seemed to be discussing something highly important in secrecy. Their expressions appeared relaxed, but in reality, they were quite tense.
